## Instructions (DELETE BEFORE SUBMISSION)

* This notebook is a template for your weekly project status assignment. Please use the sections starting with "Weekly Work Summary" as your outline for your submitted notebook. DELETE this "Instructions" section

1. Create a new copy of this notebook in the `HACL-2020-Notebooks` sub-directory of your team's github repository using the following naming convention

   * `hacl_rcsid_ddmmmyyyy.Rmd` and `hacl_rcsid_ddmmmyyyy.html`
   * For example, `hacl_erickj4_23Jul2020.Rmd`

2. Document the work you did on your assigned project this week using the outline below. As noted, you may include figures to illustrate your work

3. Commit the source (`.Rmd`) and knitted (`.html`) versions of your notebook and push to github

4. Submit a pull request; please notify Dr. Erickson if you don't see your notebook merged within one day

See the Grading Rubric for guidance on how the contents of this notebook will be graded: https://bit.ly/32OeY44

## Weekly Work Summary	

* Summary of work since last week 
* Summary of github commits 

    * include branch name
    * include files
    
* List of presentations,  papers, or other outputs (with links)
* List of references (if necessary) 
* List of location(s) of all work submitted to github
* Indicate use of group shared code base
* Indicate which parts were done by you or as part of joint efforts

## Personal Contribution	

* Clearly defined, unique contribution done by you (code, ideas, writing)

## Discussion of Primary Findings 	

* Discuss primary findings: 

    * What did you want to know? 
    * How did you go about finding it? 
    * What did you find?
	
* Provide illustrating figures and or tables
* Make sure any source code for your figures and tables are embedded in notebook or provide github location
